Details

A SceneStartTopic is a topic entry that is triggered when any of the scenes in its matchObj property starts. \[SCENETOPIC EXTENSION\] `class `**`SceneStartTopic`**` :   `[`SceneTopic`](../object/SceneTopic.html)
